about.about: A results-oriented software engineer with a strong background in optimizing legacy codebases, designing robust APIs, and implementing cutting-edge solutions. Proficient in .NET, Angular, SQL, and Azure, I honed my skills during a tenure at Deloitte, enhancing .NET Web APIs and developing Angular libraries, resulting in significant advancements. Experienced in agile methodologies, CI/CD pipelines, and Git, I excel in both backend and frontend development, specializing in scalable systems and secure authentication. As a Microsoft Azure-certified professional, I prioritize clean code, efficient solutions, and continual learning. Passionate about driving innovation in dynamic environments, I thrive on challenges and foster collaborative solutions that deliver tangible value.
about.title: Software Engineer

desc: Mastered foundational Computer Science principles covering Object-Oriented Programming (OOPs), Operating Systems, Database Management Systems, Computer Networking concepts, establishing a strong fundamental base.

Expanded expertise through comprehensive coursework in advanced Computer Science electives such as Cloud Computing, Distributed Systems, and Cloud Security, gaining practical insights into cutting-edge technologies and security paradigms.
educations.institute: Indian Institute of Information Technology Dharwad

educations.degree: Master of Science in Information Technology
desc: Currently I have a perfect GPA 4.00/4.00

Developed a Secure Access Management Platform as a core project in the 'Advanced Information Systems Security' course, employing cutting-edge technologies like React, Node.js, Express, and MySQL. Contributed significantly to the creation and implementation of the platform, ensuring robust security measures and efficient file access management.
Engineered and implemented a multi-layered authentication system ensuring fortified security measures for file repository management.
Developed and executed access control methodologies, setting a new standard for secure file repository management within traditional offline systems
Leveraged CSS media queries, grids, and flex box to realize responsive designs supporting 3 different viewport sizes. The responsive implementation provided a seamless user experience
Translated design concepts and user interface (UI) wireframes into well-functioning and responsive code.
Adopted proper naming conventions, code structuring, and commenting style guides in documentation and code. Enhanced readability and maintainability of codebase.
Skills: HTML · CSS · SCSS · JavaScript · TailwindCSS · TypeScript · React
Developed Python scripts to facilitate seamless bidirectional translation between Hindi and Kannada using the Google Translate API.
Analyzed and synthesized insights from over 20 research papers in a comprehensive literature review, guiding the project's strategic direction and decision-making process.
Accelerated API response times by 15% through comprehensive optimization and strategic refactoring of legacy .NET Web API code in Release 1 processes.
Collaborated with a team of 4 people and built the Practitioner history process from scratch.
Created two Angular libraries, reducing the project's codebase by over 2000 lines, resulting in enhanced reusability and efficiency across components.

Created intricate MS SQL stored procedures for vital processes (US Personal Spend, US Top Spenders), boosting processing speeds by 30% and significantly enhancing data retrieval efficiency, contributing to a 25% reduction in query execution time through optimized SQL queries.
Maintained exhaustive backend codebase documentation, detailing coding standards, endpoint functionalities, and user guidelines.
Tech Stack: NET Web APIs, Angular, MS SQL, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Swagger UI, Azure DevOps
